title: The Glowing Guide: The Adventures of Judy Alexander
summary: Judy Alexander, a 22-year-old with a passion for guiding, discovers her power to emit light and uses it to save her city from darkness while uncovering personal strengths.
summaryGerman: Judy Alexander, eine 22-Jährige mit einer Leidenschaft für das Führen, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, Licht auszustrahlen und verwendet es, um ihre Stadt vor der Dunkelheit zu retten, während sie persönliche Stärken aufdeckt.
summaryDutch: Judy Alexander, een 22-jarige met een passie voor gidsen, ontdekt haar vermogen om licht uit te stralen en gebruikt het om haar stad te redden van de duisternis terwijl ze persoonlijke krachten onthult.
summaryFrench: Judy Alexander, 22 ans, passionnée par le guidage, découvre son pouvoir d'émettre de la lumière et l'utilise pour sauver sa ville de l'obscurité tout en découvrant des forces personnelles.

story.text: Judy Alexander starts her week uneventfully, guiding tourists through the city museums. Little does she know, her life is about to change.
While demonstrating parts of an unlit historical tunnel, Judy accidentally discovers she can emit beams of light from her hands, illuminating the dark path.
Judy practices her newfound abilities, learning to control the intensity and direction of the light. She feels a mix of excitement and nervousness.
A citywide blackout thrusts Judy into action. Using her powers, she guides people to safety, becoming a beacon in the literal darkness.
News of her deeds spreads. Judy meets a group of supportive fellow heroes who share their experiences with their own powers.
Training with her new friends, Judy learns about her limits and potentials, growing stronger and more confident in her abilities.
Reflecting on her week, Judy writes in her journal, realizing she has found her true calling in helping others with her extraordinary gifts.

ending: From guiding tours to guiding hope, Judy Alexander shines a light on the power within us all.
moral: Discover your inner strengths, and use them to illuminate the world.
